title: La Pida e Companatico
typeOfFood: Vegan, International, Italian, Organic, Raw, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Bakery, Catering
description: An all-vegan restaurant serves authentic and traditional dishes such as wraps, rolls and watercress, raw food and more. The ingredients used for the fillings are mostly organic and seasonal. Dishes vary daily. Has theme days so ethnic dishes are prepared and served. Bakery items such as cakes and pies are available daily and change daily.
streetAddress: Via Cervese 385, Navigatore V Antonio Manuzzi
